## R Markdown

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(glue)
```

```{r}
df <- read_xlsx("C:/College/Courses/SDM/Github/ViolenceNHomicides/data/HomicideData_Original.xlsx", sheet = "HomicideData")
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r}
df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(NumHomicides)) + geom_density(color="red")
```

```{r}
df %>% 
  group_by(State) %>% 
  summarize(mean(NumHomicides))
```

```{r}
df %>% 
  group_by(Year) %>% 
  summarise(totalhomicides = sum(NumHomicides)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Year,totalhomicides)) + geom_line() + scale_x_continuous()
```
